name: Void Grimm
storyline: You are the commander of the "Void Grimm", a powerful space ship that can hold the most destructive weapons and advanced battle systems. In the beginning the armament is quite basic, but as you progress you will find more cards to upgrade your arsenal and recruit crew members that will further improve your combat capabilities. While traversing through space, you have to fight numerous enemy space ships.
summary: Void Grimm is a real-time deckbuilding roguelike game. Fight your way through waves of enemy spaceships. Your survival in the fast-paced battles requires quick thinking even at increased adrenaline levels. Gather your crew, optimize your deck and utilize card synergies to master your runs.
